name: .R2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .R2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive file that is compressed using WinRAR, a program used to create single or multi-volume archives; contains part two of a compressed volume; stores a compressed part or fragment of a larger file; may use the extensions R0 through R99.

content: WinRAR can create a multi-volume archive out of a large file and then build it back into the original file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
